Common.AdvancedOption: This option is for advanced players.

AutoExit.Title: Auto Exit
AutoExit.Description: Automatically exit gameplay when a certain grade can no longer be achieved.

PermissionError.Description:
Sonolus is unable to obtain required permissions to perform this action.

Please open Settings and grant Sonolus permissions.

Info.Error:
Failed to load Sonolus info.

Please check your internet connection and try again.

List.Error:
Failed to load languages.

Please check your internet connection and try again.

Localization.Error:
Failed to load language "{0}".

Please check your internet connection and try again.

Service.AuthenticationError:
Your Sonolus authentication has expired.

Please sign in with your Sonolus account and try again.

UserProfile.Error:
Failed to load user profile of "{0}".

Please check if the user ID is correct, or check your internet connection and try again.

Login.Error:
Failed to sign in.

Please check your internet connection and try again.

EditName.Error:
Failed to edit name.

Please check if your name is legal and within length limit, or check your internet connection and try again.

EditAvatar.Error:
Failed to edit avatar.

Please check if your avatar is legal, or check your internet connection and try again.

EditAboutMe.Error:
Failed to edit about me.

Please check if your about me is legal and within length limit, or check your internet connection and try again.

EditSocialLinks.Error:
Failed to edit social links.

Please check if your social links are legal and within length limit, or check your internet connection and try again.

EditFavorites.Error:
Failed to edit favorites.

Please check if your favorites are legal and within length limit, or check your internet connection and try again.

Authenticate.Error:
Failed to request authentication from Sonolus.

Please check your internet connection and try again, or contact Sonolus to report the problem.

Logout.Error:
Failed to sign out.

Please check your internet connection and try again.

CustomServer.SonolusVersionError:
This server only supports Sonolus version {0}.

Please update your Sonolus app, or contact server owner to report the problem.
CustomServer.SonolusVersionTooOld:
This server only supports an old version of Sonolus ({0}).

Please wait for the server to be updated, or contact server owner to report the problem.

NotLoggedInError.Description:
You are not signed in with a Sonolus account.

Please sign in with your Sonolus account first and try again.

This server requires sign in but you are not signed in with a Sonolus account.

Please sign in with your Sonolus account first and try again.

Confirmation.Description:
This server requires sign in.

Sign in as "{0}" and continue?

Expired.Description:
Your session has expired.

Sign in as "{0}" again and continue?

Rejected.Description:
Your session was rejected by the server.

Sign in as "{0}" again and continue?

NotLoggedInError.Description:

Please sign in with your Sonolus account first and try again.

Multiplayer.Disconnected: You have been disconnected from the multiplayer room.
Multiplayer.Error:
A fatal error has occurred with the multiplayer room.

Please contact server owner to report the problem.

Invalid.Description:
Link "{0}" is invalid.

Please use a different link.

NotLoggedInError.Description:
You are not signed in with a Sonolus account.

Please sign in with your Sonolus account first and try again.

Login.Error:
Failed to sign in to external service "{0}".

Please check your internet connection and try again, or contact service owner to report the problem.

Playlist.Description: Select a custom server to add its playlists to favorite.

Level.Description: Select a custom server to add its levels to favorite.

Skin.Description: Select a custom server to add its skins to favorite.

Address.Title: Address
Address.Description: Custom server address is a normal web URL ("https://..."), and can usually be found on custom server's webpage.

Name.Title: Name
Name.Description: You can name it however you like.

Name.Title: Name
Name.Description: You can name it however you like.

Scp.Error:
Failed to load package "{0}".

Your package may be unsupported or corrupted.

Mode.Title: Mode
Mode.Description:
Recommend to use standard mode.

An item with source can be exported as a link to the source, greatly reducing the package size at the cost of requiring internet connection when importing.
Standard mode exports items with sources as links, and items without sources fully. Source only mode exports only items with sources as links. Full mode exports all items fully.

CalibrateAudio.Title: Calibrate Audio
CalibrateAudio.Description: Calibrate audio by adjusting Device Audio Offset until audio and graphics sync up.

CalibrateInput.Title: Calibrate Input
CalibrateInput.Description:
Calibrate input by tapping along with your finger. Please make sure your audio offset is correctly calibrated first.
If you are accustomed to games that do not offer such option, you can leave it at 0.

UpdateAvailable.Title: Update Available
UpdateAvailable.Description:
Sonolus version {0} is available!

Visit our website:
https://sonolus.com

NotDeepLink.Description:
Link "{0}" is not a "sonolus://..." link.

Do you want to open it as a custom server?

SocialLinkAddress.Title: Address
SocialLinkAddress.Description: A web URL ("https://...") to link to.

AddFavorite.Title: Add Favorite
AddFavorite.Description: Select the type of favorite to add:

CreateRoom.Title: Create Room
CreateRoom.Description: Creating room "{0}", you can invite others to play together by sharing the room link.

Failed to decode SFX audio of "{0}".

Please contact SFX author to report the problem.

Bgm.Error:
Failed to decode level BGM of "{0}".

Please contact level author to report the problem.

Boot.Error:
Failed to boot level "{0}".

Please contact level author to report the problem.

Please contact SFX author to report the problem.

Please contact level author to report the problem.

Please contact level author to report the problem.

Please contact background author to report the problem.

Failed to decode SFX audio of "{0}".

Please contact SFX author to report the problem.

Failed to boot SFX "{0}".

Please contact SFX author to report the problem.

Audio.Error:
Failed to decode SFX audio of "{0}".

Please contact SFX author to report the problem.

Boot.Error:
Failed to boot tutorial "{0}".

Please contact engine author to report the problem.

Audio.Error:
Failed to decode SFX audio of "{0}".

Please contact SFX author to report the problem.

Bgm.Error:
Failed to decode level BGM of "{0}".

Please contact level author to report the problem.

Boot.Error:
Failed to boot replay "{0}".

Please contact replay author to report the problem.

LevelAudioOffset.Title: Level Audio Offset
LevelAudioOffset.Description: Additional audio offset of this level, should only be used when this level in particular is off sync. Increase if your audio is too late, and decrease otherwise.

ServerAudioOffset.Title: Server Audio Offset
ServerAudioOffset.Description: Additional audio offset of this server, should only be used when all levels of this server is off sync. Increase if your audio is too late, and decrease otherwise.

Blur.Title: Blur
Blur.Description: Blur background image to reduce distraction.

Mask.Title: Mask
Mask.Description: Mask can be used to dim or colorize background image.

JudgmentErrorStyle.Title: Judgment Error Style
JudgmentErrorStyle.Description: Style of judgment error. Positive judgment error on the left, while negative judgment error on the right.

JudgmentErrorMin.Title: Minimum Judgment Error
JudgmentErrorMin.Description: Minimum judgment error. Only judgment errors larger than this will be shown.

EngineInputOffset.Title: Engine Input Offset
EngineInputOffset.Description:
Recommend to use 0.

Additional input offset of this engine, should only be used when you have trouble playing this engine in particular. Increase if your inputs are registered as too late, and decrease otherwise.

ExitConfirmation.Description: Are you sure to leave the room?

Actions.NoSource:
This level cannot be selected because it does not have a source server.

Please use a different level, or contact level author to report the problem.
Actions.NoOtherServers:
This level cannot be selected because the room does not allow levels from other servers.

Please use a different level.

Confirmation.Description:
Are you sure to start?

Players that are still preparing will be forced to skip.

Are you sure to finish?

Players that are still playing will lose their results.

Actions.NoSource:
This level cannot be suggested because it does not have a source server.

Please use a different level, or contact level author to report the problem.
Actions.NoOtherServers:
This level cannot be suggested because the room does not allow levels from other servers.

Please use a different level.

Confirmation.Description: Are you sure to reset scoreboard?

UpdateMasterConfirmation.Description: Are you sure to change room master to {0}?

UpdateLeadConfirmation.Description: Are you sure to change room lead to {0}?

TargetFps.Title: Target FPS
TargetFps.Description:
Recommend to use your device's screen refresh rate.

Sonolus targets to run at this FPS, however it is not guaranteed if device is incapable of doing so.

RenderMode.Title: Render Mode
RenderMode.Description:
Recommend to use standard render mode.

Standard render mode provides accurate graphics, while lightweight render mode provides slightly inaccurate graphics but vastly improved performance.

RenderScale.Title: Render Scale
RenderScale.Description:
Recommend to use 100%.

Sonolus renders at this scale and upscale or downscale to screen size. Render scale higher than 100% may improve graphics at the cost of worse performance, while render scale lower than 100% improves performance at the cost of worse graphics.

AntiAliasing.Title: Anti-Aliasing
AntiAliasing.Description:
Recommend to use off.

Anti-aliasing improves graphics by minimizing artifacts in particular around sprite edges, at the cost of worse performance.

GpuParticleSystem.Title: GPU Particle System
GpuParticleSystem.Description:
Recommend to turn off.

Sonolus by default uses CPU particle system. When turned on, GPU particle system will be used instead. For most mobile devices, GPU is weaker than CPU and thus this is not recommended.

IgnoreNotch.Title: Ignore Notch
IgnoreNotch.Description: Sonolus by default takes into account device's notches to ensure graphics are always visible. When turned on, Sonolus instead ignores notches and renders fullscreen, which may result in graphics being partially obscured.

AlwaysDecodeLevelBgm.Title: Always Decode Level BGM
AlwaysDecodeLevelBgm.Description:
Recommend to turn off.

Sonolus by default uses operating system's native audio capabilities for best performance, and decodes level BGM only if the format is not supported natively. When turned on, Sonolus always decodes BGM.

LevelBgmQuality.Title: Level BGM Quality
LevelBgmQuality.Description:
Recommend to use high.

Sonolus by default uses operating system's native audio capabilities for best performance, and decodes level BGM only if the format is not supported natively. Level BGM will be decoded at this quality.

PreviewBgmQuality.Title: Preview BGM Quality
PreviewBgmQuality.Description:
Recommend to use mid.

Sonolus by default uses operating system's native audio capabilities for best performance, and decodes preview BGM only if the format is not supported natively. Preview BGM will be decoded at this quality.

MultiplayerPreload.Title: Multiplayer Preload
MultiplayerPreload.Description:
Recommend to turn on.

In multiplayer, start preloading once level has been confirmed to improve loading speed.

ReplayTitleTemplate.Title: Replay Title Template
ReplayTitleTemplate.Description:
Template for title when creating a replay.

Special parameters are available and will be replaced with corresponding values.

ReplaySubtitleTemplate.Title: Replay Subtitle Template
ReplaySubtitleTemplate.Description:
Template for subtitle when creating a replay.

Special parameters are available and will be replaced with corresponding values.

ReplayDescriptionTemplate.Title: Replay Description Template
ReplayDescriptionTemplate.Description:
Template for description when creating a replay.

Special parameters are available and will be replaced with corresponding values.

OverwriteReplayOptions.Title: Overwrite Replay Options
OverwriteReplayOptions.Description: Overwrite options with your own when watching replay.

ContentLocalization.Title: Content Language
ContentLocalization.Description: Language to use for content. Custom servers may provide content in this language if available.

Scale.Title: UI Scale
Scale.Description: UI scale to use. Increase if you have difficulty reading, and decrease to show more content on screen at once.

PositiveJudgmentErrorColors.Title: Positive Judgment Error Colors
PositiveJudgmentErrorColors.Description: Judgment error colors for positive errors.

NegativeJudgmentErrorColors.Title: Negative Judgment Error Colors
NegativeJudgmentErrorColors.Description: Judgment error colors for negative errors.

AllPerfectComboColors.Title: All Perfect Combo Colors
AllPerfectComboColors.Description: Combo colors when grade is All Perfect.

FullComboComboColors.Title: Full Combo Combo Colors
FullComboComboColors.Description: Combo colors when grade is Full Combo.

PassComboColors.Title: Pass Combo Colors
PassComboColors.Description: Combo colors when grade is Pass.

FailComboColors.Title: Fail Combo Colors
FailComboColors.Description: Combo colors when grade is Fail.

BoldComboNumber.Title: Bold Combo Number
BoldComboNumber.Description: Use bold font for combo number.

ShowZeroCombo.Title: Show Zero Combo
ShowZeroCombo.Description: Show combo when combo is zero.

Device.Title: Device
Device.Description: Use this to save offsets for different device scenarios, such as when playing with speaker, headphones, bluetooth, etc.

DeviceAudioOffset.Title: Device Audio Offset
DeviceAudioOffset.Description:
Recommend to use 0.

Audio offset of your device scenario. For most devices using speaker, 0 is the correct offset. Bluetooth is not recommended. Increase if your audio is too late, and decrease otherwise.

DeviceInputOffset.Title: Device Input Offset
DeviceInputOffset.Description:
Recommend to use 0.

Input offset of your device scenario. If you are accustomed to games that do not offer such option, you can leave it at 0. Increase if your inputs are registered as too late, and decrease otherwise.

AutoClean.Title: Auto Clean
AutoClean.Description: Automatically clean repository on launch by deleting oldest resources.

AlwaysRevalidate.Title: Always Revalidate
AlwaysRevalidate.Description:
Recommend to turn off.

Sonolus by default only revalidate online resources after stale. When turned on, online resources are always revalidated before using.

ShowFps.Title: Show FPS
ShowFps.Description: Show FPS counter on bottom left of screen.

ShowTouches.Title: Show Touches
ShowTouches.Description: Show touch indicators. Touch indicators are useful for showing inputs in video recordings.

DebugMode.Title: Debug Mode
DebugMode.Description: Debug mode enables debug specific code to run, and shows debug log on bottom right of screen.

DiagnosticLogs.Title: Diagnostic Logs
DiagnosticLogs.Description: Diagnostic logs to aid troubleshooting problems with Sonolus.

Repository.Title: Repository
Repository.Description: Repository stores all resources locally available on this device.

RepairRepository.Title: Repair Repository
RepairRepository.Description:
Check all repository resources for corrupted files and repair them.
You may need to update collections after repair.

DeleteRepository.Title: Delete Repository
DeleteRepository.Description: Delete all repository resources which causes Sonolus to re-download when requested.

Confirmation.Description: Are you sure to delete all repository resources?

Cache.Title: Cache
Cache.Description:
Cache allows Sonolus to speed up loading network requests and reduce bandwidth usage, by memorizing network URLs and the local repository resources they associate with.
Cache takes up a very small amount of storage, and is recommended to not be deleted.

ExpireCache.Title: Expire Cache
ExpireCache.Description: Expire all cache which causes Sonolus to revalidate before using the local repository resources which network URLs are associated with.

ExpireConfirmation.Description: Are you sure to expire all cache?

DeleteCache.Title: Delete Cache
DeleteCache.Description: Delete all cache which causes Sonolus to re-download all network requests. Not recommended.

DeleteConfirmation.Description: Are you sure to delete all cache?

Description.Normal: Your gameplay was recorded, click Create to create a replay from it.
Description.HasUsedPause: Replay cannot be created because pause was used.
Description.HasUsedSnapshot: Replay cannot be created because snapshot was used.
